page.title: 06LOCAL NEWS,REIGATE/REDHILL
page.content: Unfortunately{acts of violence}made headline news in the{local paper,}"The Surrey Mirror" of May 10th. Police are hunting a man involved in an armed attack on a snack bar;& racial tension between the Asian & white population led to fighting at Redhill's Cromwell Estate. A serious accident occurred on the M25, involving a car & lorry, with a mother & daughter badly hurt. Also a light plane crashed into a ditch, but with no injuries. Major local events included the {county elections,}in which the Alliance Parties won control of many seats.The Redhill and Reigate annual {music festival}was reported as were {various meetings}of church and social groups.
